verses.name: Numbers 29:15
verses.text: And a several tenth deal to each lamb of the fourteen lambs:

verses.name: Numbers 29:16
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:17
verses.text: And on the second day ye shall offer twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:

verses.name: Numbers 29:18
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
